com.ac.games.rest.controller

Class MMDataController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ac.games.rest.controller.MMDataController

  • @RestController
@RequestMapping(value="/external/mmdata")
public class MMDataController
extends Object
    This class should be the intercepter for REST service access to the MiniatureMarket game information.

    It should handle all request that come in under the /external/mmdata entry.

    Refer to the individual methods to determine the parameter lists.

    Author:
    ac010168

    • Method Detail

      • getMMData

        @RequestMapping(method=GET,
                produces="application/json;charset=UTF-8")
public Object getMMData(@RequestParam(value="mmid",defaultValue="-1")
                              long mmID,
                              @RequestParam(value="source",defaultValue="mm")
                              String source,
                              @RequestParam(value="sync",defaultValue="n")
                              String sync,
                              @RequestParam(value="review",defaultValue="null")
                              String review)
        GET method designed to handle retrieving the Miniature Market content from the miniaturemarket website and return the formatted MiniatureMarketPriceData object.

        This method supports the following parameters:

        • mmid=<gameid> - The gameID. This is required.
        • source=<mm|db|hybrid> - This indicated whether to request the game from BoardGameGeek (bgg) or from our cached database (db). Default is mm.
        Parameters:
        mmID -
        Returns:
        A MiniatureMarketPriceData object or SimpleErrorData message reporting the failure

      • putMMData

        @RequestMapping(method=PUT,
                consumes="application/json;charset=UTF-8",

public Object putMMData(@RequestParam(value="mmid")
                              long mmID,
                              @RequestParam(value="review",defaultValue="null")
                              String review,
                              @RequestParam(value="gameid",defaultValue="-1")
                              long gameID,
                              @RequestBody
                              com.ac.games.data.MiniatureMarketPriceData data)
        PUT Method, which should update (or potentially upsert) the provided data object.
        Parameters:
        data -
        Returns:
        A SimpleMessageData or SimpleErrorData message indicating the operation status
